articles.author: Ryan Taylor
articles.title: Transfer news LIVE - Man City £70m Paqueta swoop, Man Utd bid, Chelsea GK exit - Express
articles.description: Transfer news LIVE - Express Sport brings you up to date with all the latest from the summer transfer market.
articles.content:
Manchester City have held talks with West Ham over a big-money swoop for £70million-rated Lucas Paqueta.
The Brazilian international playmaker has worked his way towards the top of Pep Guardiola's s… [+865 chars]
